textBeforeTable: Songs include: According to www.hollywoodreporter.com, the Disney Infinity in-game soundtrack includes sixteen songs from a variety of Disney properties. Edit Page    Last Edit: 1 year 10 months ago Soundtrack var baseUrl = "\/wikis\/disney-infinity"; } background-image:
